Row.Text: What are you doing all the way out here? My name's Olgit. Let me get you to safety.
This is Hosedam's doing, isn't it? I should have seen this coming.
Well, we're both about to have a miserable time, I guess.
When good things happen to me, I'm not going to let them slip away. Shall we make a public Declaration of Friendship?
It was foolish of me not to poison you when we first met.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Sometimes, when things are rough, I need to take matters into my own hands.
Is all this really necessary? My people use that land you've been gobbling up.
Well, if it isn't you. I hope you're suffering.
You know, I don't say this kind of thing often, but I'm glad to see you.
You must be dedicated to come all the way out here. What did you want to talk about?
I left my campfire for this?
I can see what you're trying to do. Let me tell you - you may be able to conquer me, but I'll make it very unpleasant if you try.
I'm not sure I have a lot to offer, but I'll gladly negotiate.
Can't say I'm terribly surprised. Oh well, time to rebuild.
Your goods are finer than anything I've seen in years. Things would really start looking up for my people if we could get some of them.
Nice try, but I do stand up for myself occasionally. It's not happening.
My citizens are begging to go somewhere warmer... could they perhaps visit you?
I've been pushed around before. Don't think I can't recognize it.
Things aren't great out here... but if you helped out, you could probably prevent some of us from starving.
Yeah, yeah, I've heard it all before.
Come on, the least you could do is give it some effort.
I guess good things do happen occasionally![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Uh, sorry... didn't mean to gloat.
